actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to provide additional educational benefits to veterans who have served in the Indochina theater of operations during the Vietnam era.

summary.text: Provides additional educational benefits of up to $3000 for an ordinary school year, exclusive of living expenses, to veterans who have served in the Indochina theater of operations during the Vietnam era. Authorizes a monthly subsistence allowance based on the number of dependents and the extent of participation in the educational program.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to provide additional educational benefits to veterans who have served in the Indochina theater of operations during the Vietnam era.
